name: Verify Admin can promote Reader to Writer
description:
- Login with valid credentials.
- Create new organization via **API**.
- Create new project.
- Signup `second user`.
- Invite `second user` to organization via **API**.
- Invite `second user` to project with `Reader` role.

### Verify that:

- `Admin` can promote Reader to `Writer`.
descriptionHtml:
• Login with valid credentials.
  • Create new organization via API.
  • Create new project.
  • Signup second user.
  • Invite second user to organization via API.
  • Invite second user to project with Reader role.

Verify that:

  • Admin can promote Reader to Writer.

testStage.description:
- Login with valid credentials.
- Create new organization via **API**.
- Create new project.
- Signup `second user`.
- Invite `second user` to organization via **API**.
- Invite `second user` to project with `Reader` role.

### Verify that:

- `Admin` can promote Reader to `Writer`.

Verify that:
